mapper.select:
select BRD_IDX, BRD_TIT, BRD_WRT_ID, BRD_SYSDATE,
BRD_VIEWS, CATEGORY_IDX from BOARD_T where CATEGORY_IDX = #{num} ORDER BY BRD_IDX DESC limit 7

h.board_idx, h.count from BOARD_T b left OUTER JOIN (SELECT board_idx, COUNT(mem_idx) AS count FROM HEART_T GROUP BY board_idx) h ON b.brd_idx = h.board_idx where CATEGORY_IDX = #{num} ORDER BY BRD_IDX DESC
select BRD_IDX, BRD_TIT, BRD_WRT_ID, BRD_SYSDATE, BRD_VIEWS, CATEGORY_IDX, BRD_CONTENT from BOARD_T where (BRD_IDX = #{num})
mapper.update: update BOARD_T set BRD_VIEWS = BRD_VIEWS + 1 where BRD_IDX = #{num}
mapper.insert:
insert into BOARD_T ( BRD_TIT, BRD_WRT_ID, BRD_VIEWS, CATEGORY_IDX, BRD_CONTENT)
values( #{BRD_TIT}, #{BRD_WRT_ID}, 0, #{CATEGORY_IDX}, #{BRD_CONTENT})
